issue.title: [CF 1582] Void Bolt/Void Eruption Is Not Prioritizing In a Meta When Put At The Top of the List
issue.body:
I understand you cannot track Void Bolt due to how the spell was designed.  I also understand Void Eruption should be tracked and a condition should be created to track Void Form.  But when this icon is created and put at the top of the list in a meta, it does not show when it is prioritized as first in the list.  The condition of Void Form is tracked by using Buff - Number of > player > Void Form > `1 active.  Initially, Void Bolt will show immediately after Void Eruption, then it will show a second time over a Mind Flay cast as it should.  When it's supposed to show for a 3rd or 4th time it will not.  Other spells in the priority will show instead.


> Posted by CurseForge user daemon9 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1582 | Raw
